channel.title: Ritesh Shukla on Community Over Code Europe
channel.description: Recent content in Ritesh Shukla on Community Over Code Europe

item.title: Elevating Scalable Object Storage: A Comprehensive Exploration of Ozoneâ€™s Trailblazing Capabilities
item.description: In the era of explosive data growth, scalability is paramount for any storage solution. This abstract focuses on the scalability aspects of Apache Ozone, a distributed object storage system designed to handle the ever-increasing demands of modern data-intensive applications. The session will commence with an up-to-date overview of Apache Ozone, providing insights into its current state, recent enhancements, and its pivotal role in addressing the evolving needs of organizations. Attendees will gain a comprehensive understanding of how Apache Ozone offers scalable, high-performance, and future-ready solutions tailored to the challenges posed by today’s data-intensive applications.
